title: Motion Med Sync Test Scripts
subtitle: Complete test scripts with setup, execution steps, and teardown for each functional scenario.

test_scripts.title: Send Magic Link to Valid Email
setup: Clear existing magic links for this email
expected_result: Confirmation message is shown
Email is received within 30 seconds
teardown: Reset test user state if necessary

test_scripts.title: Validate Single-Use Magic Link
setup: Generate and store a valid magic link
steps: Use magic link to log in
Re-use same link in a new browser tab
expected_result: First use logs in successfully
Second use fails with 'link used' message
teardown: Invalidate used link if not already

test_scripts.title: Verify Magic Link Expiration
expected_result: System shows 'link expired' error
teardown: Generate new link to restore access

test_scripts.title: Enforce Magic Link Rate Limit
setup: Ensure rate limiting is enabled for the environment
steps: Request magic link 21 times within 1 hour
expected_result: 21st request is denied with rate limit warning
teardown: Reset rate limit counter for test user

test_scripts.title: Deny Unregistered Email Magic Link
setup: Use an email address not in system
steps: Enter unregistered email and request link
expected_result: System shows 'email not found' or similar error

test_scripts.title: Admin Creates Researcher Account
steps: Fill out and submit new researcher form
expected_result: New user appears in list
User receives onboarding email

test_scripts.title: Admin Deactivates User
expected_result: User is marked as inactive
User can no longer log in

test_scripts.title: Admin Assigns Researcher to Study
expected_result: Researcher sees assigned study on next login

test_scripts.title: Researcher Cannot Access Admin Functions
steps: Attempt to access user management screen
expected_result: Access is denied or screen is hidden

test_scripts.title: Researcher Sees Only Assigned Studies
setup: Assign researcher to Study A only
expected_result: Only Study A is shown

test_scripts.title: Deny Researcher Access to Unauthorized Study
setup: Ensure researcher is not assigned to Study B
steps: Attempt to access Study B via direct link
expected_result: Access is denied with error message

test_scripts.title: Log Unauthorized Access Attempt
expected_result: Access denied
Event is logged in audit system

test_scripts.title: Admin Assigns Participant to Study
expected_result: Participant appears in study roster

test_scripts.title: Admin Marks Participant as Completed
setup: Participant is active in a study
expected_result: Participant is locked from editing
Sync is disabled
teardown: Reset participant to active if needed

test_scripts.title: No Sync for Completed Participant
expected_result: No data is retrieved
System logs sync skip

test_scripts.title: Lock Editing for Completed Participant
steps: Attempt to edit participant profile or data
expected_result: UI prevents changes
Save button is disabled or blocked

test_scripts.title: Garmin Sync with Valid Token
expected_result: Data is pulled and visible in dashboard

test_scripts.title: Handle Revoked Garmin Access
setup: Link and then revoke Garmin access
expected_result: Sync fails gracefully with error message

test_scripts.title: Validate Garmin Data Timestamp
setup: Ensure recent activity in Garmin account
expected_result: Timestamps match expected event times

test_scripts.title: Compare Garmin Data to Connect App
steps: Sync and compare with Garmin Connect app
expected_result: Metrics match across platforms

test_scripts.title: Download Summary CSV
expected_result: CSV includes participant summaries with headers

test_scripts.title: Download Detailed CSV
expected_result: CSV includes time-series data with correct formatting

test_scripts.title: Validate CSV Against Offline Metrics
expected_result: Values match within defined tolerances

test_scripts.title: Restrict CSV Download for Unauthorized User
setup: User is not assigned to study
expected_result: Access is denied or option is hidden

test_scripts.title: Validate CSV Metadata and Headers
expected_result: Correct study metadata and column headers present

test_scripts.title: Logout After Inactivity
expected_result: Session times out and user is logged out

test_scripts.title: Inactivity Warning Message
expected_result: Warning message shown at 14-minute mark

test_scripts.title: Logout After Max Session Time
expected_result: Session expires and login is required

test_scripts.title: Logout on Browser Close
expected_result: Session is terminated, user must log in again

test_scripts.title: Reauthentication After Timeout
expected_result: Redirected to login with reauthentication prompt
